clearplot
hold on
t = 0:0.01:20;
y = -8 * exp(-t) -10*t + 2008;
plot(t, y, 'b')
plot([0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0, 6.5, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0, 10.5, 11.0, 11.5, 12.0, 12.5, 13.0, 13.5, 14.0, 14.5, 15.0, 15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, 17.5, 18.0, 18.5, 19.0, 19.5, 20.0], [1997.4166666666667, 1993.876736111111, 1989.758861400463, 1985.291812096113, 1980.6138031414016, 1975.80833939793, 1970.9258717195826, 1965.996880830581, 1961.0397821684758, 1956.0657017267872, 1951.0813614599338, 1946.0908225487099, 1941.0965386231787, 1936.099992084837, 1931.1020785512555, 1926.1033391247167, 1921.104100721183, 1916.1045608523812, 1911.1048388483134, 1906.105006804189, 1901.1051082775307, 1896.1051695843412, 1891.1052066238726, 1886.105229001923, 1881.1052425219948, 1876.1052506903716, 1871.1052556254326, 1866.105258607032, 1861.105260408415, 1856.1052614967505, 1851.1052621542865, 1846.1052625515479, 1841.1052627915599, 1836.1052629365672, 1831.1052630241759, 1826.105263077106, 1821.1052631090847, 1816.105263128405, 1811.1052631400778, 1806.10526314713, 1801.1052631513908], 'r')
